    • 方法详细资料

      • geFileFromAssets

        public static java.lang.String geFileFromAssets(android.content.Context context,
                                                java.lang.String fileName)
        get an asset using ACCESS_STREAMING mode. This provides access to files that have been bundled with an application as assets -- that is, files placed in to the "assets" directory.
        参数:
        context - context
        fileName - The name of the asset to open. This name can be hierarchical.
        返回:
        geFileFromAssets

      • geFileFromRaw

        public static java.lang.String geFileFromRaw(android.content.Context context,
                                             int resId)
        get content from a raw resource. This can only be used with resources whose value is the name of an asset files -- that is, it can be used to open drawable, sound, and raw resources; it will fail on string and color resources.
        参数:
        context - context
        resId - The resource identifier to open, as generated by the appt tool.
        返回:
        geFileFromRaw

      • geFileToListFromAssets

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> geFileToListFromAssets(android.content.Context context,
                                                                      java.lang.String fileName)
        参数:
        context - 上下文
        fileName - 文件的名字
        返回:
        返回资源下的文件

      • geFileToListFromRaw

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> geFileToListFromRaw(android.content.Context context,
                                                                   int resId)
        参数:
        context - 上下文
        resId - id
        返回:
        raw下的文件
